page.title: 02Politics
page.content: Penyffordd is in the east Flintshire Parlimentary constituency.Elected representatives at the various levels of government are :_ a) Beata Brooks (Con) on the E.E.C. b) Barry Jones (Lab) M.P. in the Westminster Parliment. c) E.M.Jones (Lab) on the Clwyd County Council. d) E.M.Evans and Mrs.E.M.Davies (Con) on Alyn and Deeside District Council. e) The Hope and Penyffordd community councillors are members of the community.{ The{County Council}is responsible for consumer protection,education,fire service,road maintenance,libraries,police and social services. The{District Council}is responsible for leisure facilities,industrial and enviromental development.
